EmailTemplate.name: Case received via email
EmailTemplate.subject: DS Clearing House Process Change:{!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your email. Our process has changed.
In order to process you request, please resubmit your request by using the new method from SalesForce AF-1146.
Instructions are attached for your review.
If you have any questions, please contact the Proposal Ops leader assigned to your CBT (on cc) or a Clearing House Team member.
This case has been cancelled.
Best Regards,
D&S Clearing House Team
